description: Post-filing processes: plan rechecks, streamlined housing resubmission, affordable housing online permits

plan_recheck.when: At the end of plan review, you may need to revise plans and bring them back for a recheck

process.step_1: Revise plans and print updated sheets
process.step_2: Contact assigned plan checker via email to coordinate timing
process.step_3: Register at Permit Center via Qless system

otc_recheck.queue: Two customers queue per plan checker; may wait onsite

inhouse_recheck.registration: Register as 'In-house recheck' with scheduled appointment
inhouse_recheck.contact: Schedule formal appointment with plan checker

plan_recheck.location: Permit Center, 49 South Van Ness, 2nd floor
plan_recheck.hours: Mon-Fri 8-5 (Mon 9-5). Queues close 4:30 PM; payments until 5 PM.
plan_recheck.staff_directory_note: If you lack plan checker contact info, find it in the DBI staff directory

streamlined_housing_resubmission.description: Withdraw and resubmit housing permits filed before 1/1/2024 to benefit from faster timelines and enhanced legal protections
steps: Withdraw original application using Unissued Extension or Withdrawal Form
Request partial refund of permit fees via Refund Request Form
Review step-by-step guide for In-house Review submission
Resubmit through online permit application portal

AB_2234_2022.completeness_notice: Building departments must notify within 15 days if application is complete

AB_1114_2023.effect: Broadens post-entitlement permit definition; removes ability to subject permits to public appeals or legal challenges
AB_1114_2023.benefit: Insulates applicants from costly post-issuance legal battles

qualifying_projects: Development Agreement projects (require Board of Supervisors + Mayor approval)

submission_requirements.title_blocks: Project address, sheet count, sheet names required
submission_requirements.stamps: Every sheet must have signature and stamp
submission_requirements.back_check_page: Include city's required Back Check Page PDF for Bluebeam submissions

affordable_housing_online.priority_confirmation: Request letter from City department partner if project qualifies
